projects.title: Grocery Web App
projects.description: The e-commerce project entails building a dynamic website with CRUD operations, product categorization,search functionality, and user authentication for seamless login & sign-up experience

projects.title: Trello Kanban Board
projects.description: The Kanban Board project built in React offers a user-friendly interface with drag and drop functionality, enabling efficient task management. It includes CRUD features for adding, deleting, and editing cards and lists.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: This URL Shortener project aims to provide a convenient and efficient solution for shortening long URLs into concise and manageable links. The project allows users to input a long URL and generates a shortened version of it for easy sharing and access.

projects.title: Gym Website
projects.description: The Gym website, built using React.js, offers multiple pages with login and register functionality, incorporating robust validation. Additionally, it includes a pricing section where users can conveniently purchase gym subscriptions
